thread.section_title: Biblio.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Biblio.com | www.biblio.com | 11 of 97
thread.title: Sue H.

author: Sue H.
title: Sue H.
text:
Loved the service and the quick delivery.
Book was said to be in "used condition" which is normally fine for me but in this case it had millions of little yellow dots on the front, upper and lower cut of the book. I think this could have been handled better by using a different terminology to describe the state the book is in. Nonetheless, I'm happy I got it - and fast - so still 4 stars!
